pages.text: Type: Overhaul $(br)Tamable: Yes $(br)Chest-able: Yes $(br)Drops: Horse Meat, Leather

The Mustang horse spawns naturally in the world and can be bred for a 1-in-5 chance of getting a random breed. $(br2)You can place armor or carpets on your horses, mules and donkeys. You can also customize and cut your O-Horse's mane and/or tail with Mane Scissors and Tail Scissors respectively. $(br2)To remove chests, simply shear them off with Shears.

The natural breed of wild O-Horses is the Mustang, regardless of biome, unless configured otherwise. $(br)Some breeds come with different chances for feathering around their hooves. These are just general chances; every breed has a very small chance of getting any feathering type. $(br2)-Stock: Generally None $(br)-Warmblood: Half or None $(br)-Draft/ Coldblood: Full or Half $(br)-Pony: Full or Half $(br)-Racer: Generally None

Draft horses can wear Heavy Armors without being slowed down. Other breeds, however, will be over-encumbered by heavy armor, and should wear Light Armor instead. Racing breeds will be slowed by *any* armor.
O-Horses are a great upgrade to vanilla horses due to their new versatility. They can also be customized cosmetically with things like blankets.
